name: Dino io (opoly)
description:
Dino io is a fun opoly-style game about your favorite dinosaurs. The game features everyone's favorite dinosaurs from giant-sized plant eaters to giant-sized meat eaters. Collect and trade dinosaurs and other properties while you play a strategic opoly-based game that celebrates the age of the dinosaurs.

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
